reviewText: Very disappointing. It's just experts talking over the videos. Your not getting a collection of their videos.

There is not one complete ABBA song or video on all five DVDs. What they have done is take ten second snippets of a song and then obscure nobody musicians sit and give their opinions of the songs. If you are and ABBA fan you will be supremely disappointed. Don't waste your time or money.

I expected to sit down and enjoy the best of their performances. I was always a fan, instead all this discs are is a biography where several people talk about them and you get to hear and see some portions of their performances; very agravating. Let the $30.00 I spend be a lesson to you all.
